title: [Bug] Reviewer isn't updated on changed settings while it is open

labels.name: Accepted
labels.description: Maintainers welcome a PR implementing this feature

body:
###### Reproduction Steps

1. Open the reviewer
2. From the navigation drawer, open ***the card browser or statistics*** (important)
3. From the navigation drawer, open settings
4. Change a setting which modifies the reviewer (e.g. fullscreen)
5. Go back to the reviewer

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/69634269/164890747-7ccf9b39-2a73-4352-8bcd-f0ea17cd9fc1.mp4

###### Expected Result

The changed settings are loaded on the reviewer

###### Actual Result

Nothing happens
